text: If you fall asleep now, you will dream. If you study now, you will live your dream.
author: Harvard students motivation

text: When you think it’s too late, the truth is, it’s still early.
author: Harvard students motivation

text: The pain of studying is only temporary. But the pain of not knowing – ignorance — is forever.
author: Harvard students motivatio

text: Success doesn't come to you. You go to it
author: Marva Collins

text: Success is 99% failure
author: Soichiro Honda

text: Enjoy the inexorable pain
author: Harvard students motivation

text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them
author: Walt Disney

text: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life
author: Carl Bard

text: We don’t develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity
author: Barbara De Angelis

text: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.
author: Denis Waitley

text: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
author: Joshua Marine

text: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

text: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston S. Churchill

text: Do one thing every day that scares you
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: All you need is love.
author: John Lennon

text: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X.

text: Wherever you go, go with all your heart
author: Confucius

text: Develop an ‘attitude of gratitude’. Say thank you to everyone you meet for everything they do for you
author: Brian Tracy

text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus
author: Bruce Lee

text: For the world you may be just one person, but for one person you may be the whole world.
author: Marva Collins

text: The memory warms you up inside, but it also breaks your soul apart.
author: Carl Bard

text: Memories take us back, dreams take us forward.
author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

text: Life is what happens while you’re busy making other plans
author: Pablo Picasso

text: Live each day as if it’s your last
author: Marva Collins

text: When words fail, music speaks
author: Ганс Христиан Андерсен
